statements: SELECT * FROM SafetyProcedures;
SELECT procedure_name, category FROM SafetyProcedures WHERE procedure_id = 1;
SELECT description, created_by FROM SafetyProcedures WHERE category = 'Fire Safety' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT procedure_id, procedure_name, created_by FROM SafetyProcedures WHERE created_by LIKE 'John%';
SELECT procedure_id, procedure_name, category FROM SafetyProcedures WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SafetyProcedures ORDER BY procedure_name DESC;
SELECT procedure_id, procedure_name, category FROM SafetyProcedures WHERE category = 'Safety Equipment' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_procedures, category FROM SafetyProcedures GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_procedures DESC;
SELECT procedure_id, description, created_by FROM SafetyProcedures WHERE description LIKE '%safety%' AND created_by LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT procedure_name, created_at FROM SafetyProcedures WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM safety_procedures;
SELECT procedure_name, description FROM safety_procedures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM training_simulations ORDER BY simulation_name DESC;
SELECT id, scenario FROM training_simulations WHERE id > 5;
SELECT procedure_name, steps FROM safety_procedures WHERE description LIKE '%safety%';
SELECT id, procedure_name, description FROM safety_procedures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM training_simulations WHERE id = 3;
SELECT procedure_name, steps FROM safety_procedures WHERE id = 2 ORDER BY procedure_name ASC;
SELECT simulation_name, scenario FROM training_simulations WHERE id IN (1, 3) ORDER BY simulation_name DESC;
SELECT id, procedure_name, description FROM safety_procedures WHERE description LIKE '%safety%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM safety_procedures;
SELECT procedure_name, description FROM safety_procedures WHERE safety_category = 'Fire Safety';
SELECT * FROM simulation_sessions ORDER BY ended_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, started_at, success FROM simulation_sessions WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video';
SELECT * FROM safety_procedures WHERE safety_category='Emergency Response' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT procedure_name, safety_category FROM safety_procedures WHERE id > 5 AND id < 10;
SELECT * FROM simulation_sessions WHERE started_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND success = TRUE ORDER BY session_id;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM training_materials WHERE material_type='Video' OR material_type='Document';
SELECT * FROM safety_procedures WHERE procedure_name LIKE '%fire%' OR description LIKE '%evacuation%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM safety_procedures;
SELECT id, procedure_name FROM safety_procedures ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT description FROM safety_procedures WHERE id = 3;
SELECT protocol_name, details FROM protocols WHERE id = 1;
SELECT session_name, start_time, trainer_id FROM training_sessions ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM safety_procedures;
SELECT id, procedure_name, description FROM safety_procedures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT procedure_name, description FROM safety_procedures WHERE procedure_name LIKE '%safety%';
SELECT id, procedure_name, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS creation_date FROM safety_procedures;
SELECT * FROM protocols ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM SafetyProcedures;
SELECT id, procedure_name, description, equipment_used FROM SafetyProcedures WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT procedure_name, description FROM SafetyProcedures WHERE equipment_used IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeRoles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT id, role_name, department, supervisor_id FROM EmployeeRoles WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM SafetyProcedures WHERE procedure_name = 'Emergency Evacuation'
SELECT id, procedure_name, description FROM SafetyProcedures ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM EmployeeRoles WHERE department = 'Engineering' AND supervisor_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, course_name, duration FROM TrainingCourses WHERE duration > 5
SELECT * FROM TrainingRecords WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
